name: cn-agent
post_cmd: [[ $(svcs -Ho state cn-agent) == 'online' ]] && /usr/sbin/svcadm restart cn-agent || /usr/sbin/svcadm enable cn-agent
post_cmd_linux: [[ $(systemctl is-active triton-cn-agent) == 'active']] && systemctl reload-or-restart triton-cn-agent || systemctl enable triton-cn-agent; systemctl start triton-cn-agent
